Failed Releases
config.description: This widget shows total number of failed Helm Releases installed in a cluster.

This widget shows status of a Helm release along with the current revision being used by the release. Please refer following mapping for determining the status of release,

            deployed:0
            failed:1
            pending-install:2
            pending-rollback:3
            pending-upgrade:4
            superseded:5
            uninstalling:6
            uninstalled:7
            unknown:8
